title: Sanjeeda Shaikh  feels lucky  to have overcome the trauma of her separation from Aamir Ali
body_text:
Sanjeeda Shaikh ‘feels lucky’ to have overcome the trauma of her separation from Aamir Ali
Sanjeeda Shaikh, proud mother to four-year-old Ayra Ali, opened up about motherhood and single parenthood in a recent interview. She stated that being a mother is her top priority and that she is blessed to have emerged from her divorce with Aamir Ali. Sanjeeda also emphasized the importance of self-love and moving on from negative relationships.
